thread.title: Honeymoon stay
thread.title_full: Honeymoon stay - Review of Hotel Le Marquis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shazwanmchaggis
title: Honeymoon stay
text:
Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in mid February. Was on my honeymoon with wife. Everything was incredible, from the checking in to the room. Was allocated the Eiffel Tower view room located on 6th floor. Must say, it was brilliant. Room was ready and well prepared to surprise my wife as she was also celebrating her belated birthday.
The hotel surprised us with balloons and complimentary drinks. Breakfast was included and it was wonderful. They served pastries and other lovely light snacks. The lady who served breakfast every morning was super friendly and helpful. She was way amazing.
Hotel is located near to Eiffel tower; about 15 minutes walking distance to Eiffel Tower. There are some pastry shops nearby and a convenient store too.
Room is big and so is the toilet. They provide HERMES bathing assessories too!
Definitely reccommendable to all those who visit Paris, France. Kudos Le Marquis. Brilliant!
I do LOVE my stay at your lovely hotel.
